alert.note: Alert for Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Warning issued September 08 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN AMARILLO HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING AT THE REQUEST OF TEXAS A&M FOREST SERVICE FOR GRAY COUNTY. * AT 507 PM CDT...THE THUT HILL WILDFIRE, A DANGEROUS WILDFIRE, WAS STILL ONGOING AND IS LOCATED LESS THAN A QUARTER MILE FROM LEFORS...MOVING RAPIDLY TO THE SOUTH AND SOUTHWEST AT 3 TO 5 MPH. * AREAS IMPACTED...LEFORS AND THE IMMEDIATE SURROUNDING AREA. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...EVACUATION AREA WILL BE AT THE FIRST BAPTIST CHURCH IN PAMPA. $$ MUSCHA
info.instruction: BE PREPARED TO EVACUATE QUICKLY IF REQUESTED AND FOLLOW ALL SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS FROM LOCAL EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS. DO NOT DRIVE INTO SMOKE. FIREFIGHTERS AND INCIDENT RESPONDERS SHOULD ANTICIPATE EXTREME FIRE BEHAVIOR INCLUDING A WIND-DRIVEN AND TORCHING FIRE.
